channel.title: Pi how do i put a crown on a rank?
channel.description: i made a new rank isdonator and i really need to know how to put a crown with it. like when they talk it will have the dollar sign next to there name. i already have the sprite for the icon i just need to know how to assign it to isdonator or whatever

item.title: Pi how do i put a crown on a rank?
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

i dint need to know how to edit or replace a crown i already know that. i made a donator rank and i need to know how to assign a icon to it. ex admin rank has yellow crown mod rank has grey crown i want my donar rank to have the red money sign.
